description: A brilliant young systems engineer in the employ of Anaheim Electronics, who is responsible for fine-tuning her company`s prototype Gundams. After the theft of the Gundam GP02A, Nina stays aboard the Albion in order to aid in the recovery of the stolen Gundam and keep an eye on the remaining GP01. Her working relationship with Kou soon develops into a clumsy romance, but Nina`s feelings are complicated by her mysterious past...
name: Nina Purpleton
